ingredients.ingredient: 12 ounces Boar's Head Bold® BourbonRidge™ Uncured Smoked Ham
12 ounces Boar's Head Sharp Wisconsin Cheddar Cheese, sliced

cookingTips: Use room temperature butter to spread easily without tearing biscuits
Toast biscuits lightly for better texture and to warm through
Layer ingredients in order: biscuit, butter, fig jam, ham, cheese for best flavor balance
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to assemble elegant open-faced biscuits with smoky ham, sharp cheddar, and fig jam.
